Aug. 26, 1893 D Blyth Contest
Blyth Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
blyth-contest
None
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Blyth, Northumberland Promoted by Blyth Flower Show. March contest: 1. South Derwent, 2. Batley, 3. Black Dyke. Prizes - 1st £40, 2nd £25, 3rd £15, 4th £7, 5th £4.10s., 6th £3.10s. 5 bands competed
April 8, 2012, 1:44 p.m. June 8, 2019, 6:38 a.m.
1 Black Dyke Band John Gladney Jnr Rossini's Works / Rossini Fantasia / Reminiscences of Rossini [arr. Owen]
2 Batley Old John Gladney Jnr Grand Selection: Mendelssohn's Works [arr. Godfrey]
3 South Derwent John Gladney Jnr Meyerbeer's Works [unknown arranger]
4 West Hartlepool Old William Holdsworth Rossini's Works / Rossini Fantasia / Reminiscences of Rossini [arr. Owen]
5 Ashington Duke Thomas Floyd Maritana [arr. Round]
Withdrawn Kingston Mills Band Unknown
